mapper.select: SELECT ep.ID AS id, ep.start_datetime AS examStartDatetime, ep.end_datetime AS examEndDatetime, ep.exam_name AS examName FROM tab_exam_plan ep LEFT JOIN tab_class_teacher_subject cts on (ep.teacher_ID=cts.teacher_ID AND ep.subject_ID=cts.subject_ID) LEFT JOIN tab_student stu ON stu.Class_NO=cts.class_ID WHERE stu.ID=#{studentId} AND ep.start_datetime>#{nowDatetime}

SELECT ep.ID AS id, ep.start_datetime AS examStartDatetime, ep.end_datetime AS examEndDatetime, ep.exam_name AS examName FROM tab_exam_plan ep LEFT JOIN tab_class_teacher_subject cts on (ep.teacher_ID=cts.teacher_ID AND ep.subject_ID=cts.subject_ID) LEFT JOIN tab_student stu ON stu.Class_NO=cts.class_ID WHERE stu.ID=#{studentId} AND #{nowDatetime}>ep.start_datetime AND ep.end_datetime>#{nowDatetime}
SELECT ID AS id, exam_name AS examName, start_datetime AS examStartDatetime, end_datetime AS examEndDatetime FROM tab_exam_plan WHERE total_scope is NULL AND teacher_id=#{account}

SELECT ID AS id, exam_name AS examName, subject_ID AS subjectId, paper_ID AS paperId, class_ID AS classId, start_datetime AS examStartDatetime, end_datetime AS examEndDatetime, time_limit AS timeLimit, create_datetime AS createDatetime, teacher_ID AS teacherId, single_choice_num AS singleNum, single_choice_scope AS singleScope, multiple_choice_num AS doubleNum, multiple_choice_scope AS getDoubleNum, judgment_num AS judgmentNum, judgment_scope AS judgmentScope, essay_num AS essayNum, essay_scope AS essayScope, total_scope AS totalScope FROM tab_exam_plan WHERE id=#{param}
mapper.update: UPDATE tab_exam_plan SET single_choice_num=#{singleNum}, single_choice_scope=#{singleScope}, multiple_choice_num=#{multiNum}, multiple_choice_scope=#{multiScope}, judgment_num=#{judgmentNum}, judgment_scope=#{judgmentScope}, essay_num=#{essayNum}, essay_scope=#{essayScope}, total_scope=#{totalScope} WHERE id=#{id}
